scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK -c green,cyan "npm --prefix frontend run dev" "npm --prefix backend run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend run build && echo 'Backend biasanya tak perlu build (JS murni)';
scripts.start: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK -c green,cyan "npm --prefix frontend run preview" "npm --prefix backend run start"
